languages.text: Среди ксеносов присутствует саботажник, намеревающийся нанести значительный урон священным технологиям. Необходимо остановить его до приведения этого плана в действие.
There is a saboteur among the xenos who is determined to do considerable damage to sacred technologies. The saboteur must be stopped before they can put their plan into action.
languages.original_text: Среди ксеносов присутствует саботажник, намеревающийся нанести значительный урон священным технологиям. Необходимо остановить его до приведения этого плана в действие.

traits.locale_text: There is a saboteur among the xenos who is determined to do considerable damage to sacred technologies. The saboteur must be stopped before they can put their plan into action.
There is a saboteur among the xenos who is determined to do considerable damage to sacred technologies. The saboteur must be stopped before they can put their plan into action.
There is a saboteur among the xenos who is determined to do considerable damage to sacred technologies. The saboteur must be stopped before they can put their plan into action.
There is a saboteur among the xenos who is determined to do considerable damage to sacred technologies. The saboteur must be stopped before they can put their plan into action.

languages.text: 异形之中有一位破坏者，打算对神圣的技术造成巨大破坏。必须赶在异形将计划付诸实践之前，阻止这位破坏者。
languages.original_text: There is a saboteur among the xenos who is determined to do considerable damage to sacred technologies. The saboteur must be stopped before they can put their plan into action.

traits.locale_text: 异形之中有一位破坏者，打算对神圣的技术造成巨大破坏。必须赶在异形将计划付诸实践之前，阻止这位破坏者。

languages.text: 異種族の中に、神聖な技術に多大な損害を与えることを意図している妨害者がいる。妨害者が計画を実行する前に阻止しなければならない。
languages.original_text: There is a saboteur among the xenos who is determined to do considerable damage to sacred technologies. The saboteur must be stopped before they can put their plan into action.

traits.locale_text: 異種族の中に、神聖な技術に多大な損害を与えることを意図している妨害者がいる。妨害者が計画を実行する前に阻止しなければならない。

languages.text: Hay un saboteador entre los xenos determinado a causar grandes daños a las tecnologías sagradas. Tienes que detenerlo antes de que pueda completar su plan.
languages.original_text: There is a saboteur among the xenos who is determined to do considerable damage to sacred technologies. The saboteur must be stopped before they can put their plan into action.

traits.locale_text: Hay un saboteador entre los xenos determinado a causar grandes daños a las tecnologías sagradas. Tienes que detenerlo antes de que pueda completar su plan.

languages.text: Unter den Xenos befindet sich ein Saboteur, der entschlossen ist, heiligen Technologien beträchtlichen Schaden zuzufügen. Der Saboteur muss gestoppt werden, ehe er seinen Plan in die Tat umsetzen kann.
languages.original_text: There is a saboteur among the xenos who is determined to do considerable damage to sacred technologies. The saboteur must be stopped before they can put their plan into action.

traits.locale_text: Unter den Xenos befindet sich ein Saboteur, der entschlossen ist, heiligen Technologien beträchtlichen Schaden zuzufügen. Der Saboteur muss gestoppt werden, ehe er seinen Plan in die Tat umsetzen kann.

languages.text: Parmi les xénos se trouve un saboteur déterminé à sérieusement endommager les technologies sacrées. Le saboteur doit être arrêté avant de pouvoir mettre son plan à exécution.
languages.original_text: There is a saboteur among the xenos who is determined to do considerable damage to sacred technologies. The saboteur must be stopped before they can put their plan into action.

traits.locale_text: Parmi les xénos se trouve un saboteur déterminé à sérieusement endommager les technologies sacrées. Le saboteur doit être arrêté avant de pouvoir mettre son plan à exécution.

languages.text: Zenolar arasında kutsal teknolojilere büyük hasarlar vermeyi amaçlayan bir sabotajcı bulunuyor. Planlarını eyleme dökmeden önce durdurulması gerek.
languages.original_text: There is a saboteur among the xenos who is determined to do considerable damage to sacred technologies. The saboteur must be stopped before they can put their plan into action.

traits.locale_text: Zenoların içinde, kutsal teknolojilere ciddi zarar vermeyi amaçlayan bir sabotajcı bulunuyor. Planlarını eyleme dökmeden önce durdurulması gerek.
